original_text: Some women also went with them. These women had been ill, but Jesus had made them well again. One of the women was Mary from Magdala. Jesus had sent seven bad spirits away from her.
korean_text: 또한 악귀를 쫓아내심과 병 고침을 받은 어떤 여자들 곧 일곱 귀신이 나간 자 막달라인이라 하는 마리아와

sentences.original_text: Some women also went with them.
but Jesus had made them well again.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 예수님께서 그들을 다시 낫게 해주셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: One of the women was Mary from Magdala.
sentences.korean_translation: 여자들 중 한 명은 막달라의 마리아였습니다.

sentences.original_text: Jesus had sent seven bad spirits away from her.
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님께서 그녀에게서 일곱 개의 악한 영을 쫓아내셨습니다.
